verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// Is anyone thirsty, anyone?
Is anyone thirsty? //
Jesus said: 'Let them come to me and drink,
Let them come to me!'

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, let the living waters flow,
O, let the living waters flow,
Let the river of Your Spirit flow through me.
O, let the living waters flow,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, let the living waters flow,
Let the river of Your Spirit flow through me.
